titles: To the magistrates and people of England vvhere this may come What is the matter with the Christians of our age, ...
author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.
notes: Title from caption title and first line of text.
Signed and dated at end: The 7. day of the 4. month, 1664. Margret Fell.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Charles II, 1660-1685 --  Early works to 1800.
